name: Time Out
text: Search the set-aside area for Frogjolnir and shuffle it into the encounter deck. You get -2 ATK while in hero form. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust your alter-ego → remove Time Out from the game.

name: Throg and Loki
text: "SMAK! SHLORP! RAWR! KLONK! SPLOOSH!" Alligator Loki can attack only Throg. When Revealed: If Throg is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for him and reveal him. [hazard]

name: Throg
text: Forced Interrupt: When this minion would enter play, discard any other Throg from play. Place a random card from your hand facedown here. When Defeated: Return each facedown card here to its owner's hand. (Alligator Loki's nemesis minion.)

name: Lightning Bolt
text: When Revealed: Discard 2 cards from the encounter deck. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon discarded this way. ___________________________________ [star] Boost: Discard 3 cards from the encounter deck.

name: Frogjolnir
text: If Throg is not in play, find him and reveal him. Attach this card to Throg. Then, Throg activates against you. Throg gains the [[aerial ]]trait. [star] Forced Response: AfterThrog attacks you, take 1 indirect damage.
